short_definition: To ratify, make firm, confirm, establish, reassert. Alternate to swearing under an oath.
long_definition_html: To ratify, make firm, confirm, establish, reassert. Alternate to swearing under an oath.

long_definition_text: To ratify, make firm, confirm, establish, reassert. Alternate to swearing under an oath.
